channel.title: Need Help ~Read~
channel.description: Ok I portfowarded everything and used the portfoward check program from portfoward.com It says my Port is open. My noip is up and my server is up but Only I can connect non of my friends can. Anyone got a suggestion and I got really good internet. Maybe I should try the ip numbers instead of my servers ip like example.no-ip.ex use like 384.38.2.3 I dont know Im just trying anything

item.title: Need Help ~Read~
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

[quote=“pl0x15, post:2, topic:339500”]First off. Wrong Section, Sorry Man. This is Server Help. Not “Get your server online help” SORRY!!! Btw there are tuts on this shit. look em up.

EDIT- But u look desperate so ill teamview you?[/quote]

Then what section would he/she post in? This is the appropriate section.

The answer to your worthless problem is:

Setup a static Ip
Portfoward your router to your new static Ip
Get a domain hosting company such as NO-IP
Run it
Connect your client with your server on the exact matching ports
Play

If you don’t have a router, skip the first 2 steps.
Port foward under 43594

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help ~Read~
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

What you need to do is PORTFORWARD.

If your using a client - make sure you GUI and CLIENT both connect to your ip.

If your using moparscape/silab - make sure your server is online/portforward.

Read full topic
